name: Force Post SEO Content Checklist
author: Artitex

sections.description: This plugin adds a new panel to the Gutenberg sidebar which forces writers to fill in post fields which are the most important for your post SEO, posts cannot be published unless all required fields are filled.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the force-post-seo-content-checklist directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Validate if the plugin works by editing a post and consulting the sidebar

short_description: A handy plugin which forces writers to fill in post fields which are important for SEO.
description: This plugin adds a new panel to the Gutenberg sidebar which forces writers to fill in post fields which are the most important for your post SEO, posts cannot be published unless all required fields are filled.
